DOC.brief_summary: A double-blinded randomize control study use pulse electromagnetic field therapy establish whether device decrease patient pain decrease narcotic use woman undergone cesarean delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Pulsed Electromagnetic Field Therapy Pain After Cesarean Delivery
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , double-blind , randomize , sham-controlled clinical trial investigate effectiveness PEMF use Ivivi SofPulse postoperative pain severity narcotic use woman cesarean delivery Jacobi Medical Center . On admission labor delivery obstetrical outpatient office , potential subject complete question relate inclusion / exclusion criterion sign consent participate study . If eligible , patient receive Ivivi Sofpulse device place incisional area turn . The device randomize functional sham group . The device leave around incision site unless patient need shower . In effort minimize bias , patient , provider investigator aware device functional . Lot number accompany device . After completion study , Lot number , provide manufacturer , reveal device functional device sham . These lot number provide completion trial . Wong-Baker Faces pain assessment tool evaluate Principal Investigator ( PI ) co-investigator determination subjective postoperative pain 0 , 2 , 6 , 12 , 24 , 48 , 72 hour cesarean delivery . Amount oxycodone milligram consume patient record 24 , 48 , 72 hour cesarean delivery . Postoperative anesthesia type ( Duramorph morphine patient control anesthesia pump ) record well . Subjects randomize PEMF treatment ( functional ) , sham treatment . All subject follow duration stay hospital follow cesarean delivery . No follow-up require . The goal recruit one hundred patient course four month . Patient data identify use medical record number keep private Jacobi Medical Center Obstetrics Gynecology server password protect . Access investigator co-investigators study . Nurse labor delivery already receive in-service proper use device .
